clauses.premises: The Lessor leases the premises to the Lessee for commercial use.
clauses.rent: The Lessee shall pay monthly rent on or before the 5th of each month.
clauses.lock_in: The lease shall have a lock-in period of 12 months.
clauses.maintenance: The Lessee shall maintain the premises in good condition.
clauses.governing_law: This lease shall be governed by Indian law.
